SprayDisperser.heading: Disperse Tokens Across the Pack
SprayDisperser.description: Connect a wallet on Celo to spray CELO or ERC20 rewards across your roster.

network.prompt: Connect a wallet to load Spray.

tips.title: Runbook
items: Amounts are expected in whole token units (18 decimals for CELO).
Token dispersal requires approving the Spray contract before sending.
Track tx receipts in your wallet or Celoscan for final settlement.
